description:
Hannah Lee Baker ( Abigail Breslin ) is a bright young woman imprisoned in a shadowy underworld of violence and weapons , methamphetamine and dangerous biker gangs laboratories , which have their only refuge in chess . She lives with Amber , her older sister ( Alexa Vega ) ; and his uncle Donny ( Lew Temple ) , an addict . All live in fear Uncle Frank Stinson ( Sean Bean) , who takes care of the illegal family business with an iron fist , aided by his psychotic younger brother, Bobby ( Jake Busey ) of . Things get worse when Amber falls in love with Wild Bill ( James Purefoy ) , a trafficker of methamphetamine at war with Frank . Hannah realizes that the only way to save his family is playing a pawn against the other in a deadly game of chess.
